item.description:
Hello Canucks,

Since most of us will be sticking around for the Thanksgiving holiday weekend, we'll get together for an early movie and Dinner on Friday November 27. I was thinking we can see the new Christmas Carol at the Commons Theater complex and then head out for dinner at Silvertone. For anyone who doesn't watch a movie you can meet us at the restaurant at around 7:30 PM. Movie times aren't out for next week, so I'll update this meetup next week.

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Black Friday Dinner and a Movie
